medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant pain for approximately 48 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began suddenly and has been persistent since onset. No nausea or vomiting reported, but patient has experienced fevers and chills at home. The patient has tolerated a regular diet without difficulty and has normal bowel movements. There has been no previous similar symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Prostate CA s/p ChemoXRT, DMII, HTN, Glaucoma, HL, NASH.
